Historic public and private sector investments are converging with advances in cloud computing and AI, driving the uptake of new digital solutions that improve operational efficiency, labor productivity and outsized climate impacts.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading=”Our Thesis” button_text=”Our Thesis” button_link=”/about/” use_bg_overlay=”on” bg_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.3)” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font_size=”72px” body_font_size=”30px” body_line_height=”1.4em” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/img-hero-home-01.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” text_orientation=”left” width_last_edited=”off|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”72px” header_font_size_phone=”40px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” body_font_size_tablet=”30px” body_font_size_phone=”24px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

Blackhorn Ventures invests in companies redefining industrial resource efficiency. Our portfolio serves enterprise customers across Energy, Construction / Real Estate, Supply Chain / Logistics and Transportation – interconnected industries that generate $3T in annual revenue and account for the vast majority of global greenhouse gas emissions.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading=”Our Portfolio” button_text=”See Our Complete Portfolio” button_link=”/portfolio/” use_bg_overlay=”on” bg_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.6)” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font_size=”72px” body_font_size=”30px” body_line_height=”1.4em” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/img-hero-home-02.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” text_orientation=”left” header_font_size_tablet=”72px” header_font_size_phone=”40px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” body_font_size_tablet=”30px” body_font_size_phone=”20px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

We invest in founders applying off-the-shelf hardware and asset-light enterprise software and vertical market business models to digitize and decarbonize the physical world. Our companies include category leaders like Aperia, Agorus, Amperon, and Datch.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading=”Our Team” button_text=”Meet Our Team” button_link=”/team/” use_bg_overlay=”on” bg_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.3)” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font_size=”72px” body_font_size=”30px” body_line_height=”1.4em” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/img-hero-home-03.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” text_orientation=”left” header_font_size_tablet=”72px” header_font_size_phone=”40px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” body_font_size_tablet=”30px” body_font_size_phone=”20px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

Blackhorn was founded by investors and operators with deep experience and relationships in the industries we serve. We’re focused on portfolio value creation and collaborative engagement with our corporate strategic LPs to achieve financial alpha and impact.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide heading=”News” button_text=”See The Latest News” button_link=”/blog/” use_bg_overlay=”on” bg_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font_size=”72px” body_font_size=”30px” body_line_height=”1.4em” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/img-hero-home-04.jpg” background_enable_image=”on” text_orientation=”left” width_last_edited=”off|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”72px” header_font_size_phone=”40px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” body_font_size_tablet=”30px” body_font_size_phone=”20px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

Market insights on AI for industrial impact, portfolio company updates & founder profiles, and our take on policies, people, and technologies at the forefront of industrial impact.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
